title: I'm not sure how to report a person in the boards.
body: I know how to report their posts but how do you report a person?

replies.body:
When you report the topic in question myself and the rest of the mods will be able to see the user who posted it and take any further action if needed! You can also use the Boards Moderation Discord if you feel like your reports are going unnoticed or we're missing something.

Boards Discord-> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=fEfHWNXQ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-20T21:26:15.110+0000)

> When you report the topic in question myself and the rest of the mods will be able to see the user who posted it and take any further action if needed! You can also use the Boards Moderation Discord if you feel like your reports are going unnoticed or we're missing something.

> Boards Discord-> https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation/7rtKBZLi-boards-moderation-discord-verification

Thank you Broporo!
Appreciate the response. I will simply report the posts and go on my way. I have every faith that you guys are taking care of what needs to be taken care of. c:
Have an awesome day though!
